Translations.Text: Ne$ $ilen at wul amehzul, ard awez$i, ur d Issuffu$ ara Öebbi leb$wev nnsen
Lemmer i £ ihwi, ad ak ten id Nessken, war ccekk, a ten tâaqlev ar udem nnsen, a ten tâaqlev ar ûûenf umeslay. Öebbi Issen igiten nnwen
S tidep, a kwen Njeôôeb, alamma Nessen imjuhad, akked iûebôiyen, segwen. A Njeôôeb isallen nnwen
Ih, wid ijehlen, issefôa$en abrid n Öebbi, i inuqmen Amazan, deffir ubeggen n nnhaya $uôsen, ur vuôôen Öebbi s wacemma. Ad Isseôxes igiten nnsen
A wid iumnen! A$et awal i Öebbi, a$et awal i Umazan, ur ssiôxiset igiten nnwen
Ih, wid ijehlen, issefôa$en abrid n Öebbi, sinna, mmuten d ijehliyen, war ccekk, ur sen Ipsemmiê Öebbi, d awez$i
Ur ppiôhifet, ur ssuturet tifrat, mara tilim d ine$laben! U Öebbi yidwen, ur kwen Ipêewwio, d awez$i, seg igiten nnwen
Tameddurt di ddunit, d urar kan, akked lhawiyya. Ma tumnem u têezbem, ad awen d Ifk arrazen nnwen. Ur awen issutur ayla nnwen
Ma Issuter awen t, a kwen Icebbwel, a pcuêêem, a d iffe$ leb$wev nnwen

D kunwi i ipwanecden a pseddqem deg ubrid n Öebbi. Llan degwen wid ipcuêêun. Win ipcuêêun, ipcuêêu kan $ef yiman is. Öebbi d Asâay, kunwi d igellilen. Ma twexxôem, a kwen Ineûûef s ugdud ur nelli segwen. D$a ur ppemcabin $uôwen
